comments.author: Alan Willert

comments.text:
The GLBT community does not seek nor require the approval of religious 
organizations. For anyone to insist gays need to continue life as second 
class citizens or to follow whatever ridiculous "rules" set up by anyone's 
"faith" is no longer just embarrassing, but offensive. Equality is a thorn 
in the side only of those who are truly inferior. Your religion has no 
bearing on the law of the land. If you prefer sitting at the back of the 
bus, go ahead! Who's stopping you? It's time to stop "ordering around" 
people who neither want nor need your input in their own life choices. A 
gay person living a life in misery by either abstaining from any meaningful 
relationships or forcing themselves into a heterosexual marriage no longer 
needs to make such a choice. For those who are quite content with their 
natural homosexual attractions there will be the option to live happily and 
contently with a same sex spouse. Who am I (or who are you) to judge them? 
The ultimate sexual perversion is abstinence.﻿

live to see the day that they do.﻿

comments.text:
You can conceive of gays as a minority that can be organized
and used to justify modifying the collective, spearheading social
change along lines very much exceeding what 99% of gays THEMSELVES 
ever envisioned.

It may seem to most straights that the gay priorities they hear so much 
about, marriage, adoption, equality, combatting hate and whatnot, reflect 
the urgent wishes and desires of gay men in general.

However, when taking a closer look at those gays and lesbians who are most 
energetic and vocal in their defense of such goals, we find that they are 
usually very young and, to put it mildly,  not well-read at all…

Nor do they appear to have much  life-experience, and clearly haven’t even 
known what the gay scene was once like. They are very reactive and loud, 
kind of like rebellious teenagers.

Their general mindframe appears to be that it is « empowering » or 
something, to outshout their adversaries: christians, haters and 
homophobes, closet gays, patriarchs, heteronormistic authoritarians and 
basically, men in general.

Is the actual idea young gays have today that being gay is all about 
shrieking at others? It certainly seems so…

 

Except for the actual agents and paid media puppets, the most vocal gays, 
those who make the most noise,  are usually the younger ones who have 
thought about matters the least.

They are intellectually undeveloped, and unfortunately, this isn’t merely a 
case of not reading too much;  the issue in reality isn’t strictly of an 
‘intellectual’ nature, we’re dealing with something larger here:

these vocals gays must strike a lucid observer as also being emotionally 
immature and undeveloped, but not in the possibly amusing, touching or 
innocent way of a 4 year old.

Rather, it’s as if they haven’t emotionally matured CORRECTLY, and have 
turned into something farcical, not to say tragic.

Watch those gays slur and shriek and whine on social media sites, and then 
think of your favourite male actor in one your favourite action movies.

What qualities does the actor’s character have? He’s probably handsome, 
masculine, brave, smart, deep, perseverant, adventurous, developed, and 
soforth. It’s easy to immediately write down a list.

Conversely, when looking at the vocal, militant gay, it’s a real 
head-breaker to even note down ONE apparent quality.

The list of negative qualites however easily comes pouring out of the 
keyboard:

they whine, shriek, slur and insult, are ignorant and bigoted…They’re not 
curious or adventurous, they’re certainly not funny. They have no depth, 
are often bitter and unhappy. They don’t look masculine, and are rarely 
attractive.

They are intellectually dishonest, lie easily, have no conception of 
virtue, have no clue of the system the live in. They blindly trust 
authority, are politically illiterate…The list goes on and on…

 

In fact, it’s fair to say in a general sense that these people simply seem 
psychologically, psychically UNDER-DEVELOPED.

 They have no identifiable higher qualities, that could present an asset to 
the collective.

They are basically shrieking gay drones.

 

Because of these shrieking, intellectually and emotionally undeveloped gays 
polluting the social sphere with the worst kind of propaganda piffle, and 
because more thoughtful gays prefer to not join the noisy and boring 
chorus, an image of gays has taken shape in society.

This image was created by the media and is being perpetuated by all the 
most irrelevant and unfortunate gay entities:

it’s a question of those having the least to offer shrieking the loudest, 
while always presuming and suggesting they are defending a larger cause, of 
which they are the self-proclaimed voiceboxes.

Basically, they tell society that they are speaking for all males with 
homosexual desires.

 

*

 

In fact, like the proverbial rats leaving the sinking ship, it is not 
unusual to actually hear  older generations of gay activists tacitly 
confess in interviews reminiscing about the old days that they’re not too 
happy with the current developments…

It now turns out they’re not really for gay assimilation after all. Gay 
assimilation refers to the full blending into mainstream culture, and a 
full ‘equalization’ of gays and straights.

You’ll find VERY few 60 year old gays in general, and actually few elderly 
activists, who don’t consider things were MUCH, MUCH better 30 or 40 years 
ago. 

Of course, older generation activists have to be careful about  what they 
say, especially since they THEMSELVES were the ones instrumental in 
bringing about the modern situation.

Often, they’ll state something general to the effect that gays have come a 
long way, and that things have changed so much, but when pressed for a more 
personal view, will admit that they’re not really crazy about the current 
state of gay culture.

They obviously don’t want to create a crisis or a situation, so their 
criticism remains subtle and is never full on. But it’s quite noticeable 
anyway what they’re really thinking.

They’re clearly thinking: God, how much more fun it was back then!!! You 
guys today have NOTHING left!!!

As soon as older generation activists talk about gay life in the old days, 
the 70s or even the 60s or the 50s, their faces instantly light up: it was 
all such fun, so exciting!! 

Harry Hay in later life was one of the most vocal older-generation 
activists overtly criticising and opposing assimilation.

 

*

 

So most gays today don’t know where they came from, where they’re going, or 
who or what they even are.

Considering this profound state of ignorance, it was only logical that so 
many gays would turn into hysterical bigots chanting party-lines.

Surreptiously, stealthily, gayness is being associated with an entire 
ideology and set of social priorities that are COMPLETELY convergent with 
authority’s agendas and the dominant political and cultural paradigm ALL OF 
US are being versed into.

 

You will find modern  ‘gay culture’ in the West abhors religious 
fundamentalism and is rabidly positioned against Islam (Dan Savage’s « Say 
Yes to War in Irak »).

All vocal gays energetically defend atheism and are completely uncritical 
of science and technology.  This signifies the medical system controls 
their health,  darwinism controls their view of life, and experts in 
general are invested with full authority.

Pornography is considered an expression of freedom, pedophilia is hardly 
considered a problem, consumerism is self-evident and our entire system is 
pretty much considered sane.

Politicians are trusted, conspiracies don’t exist, and law-making is the 
only way to secure progress.

 

It is undeniable: gay activism and the mediatic and political priorities 
are FULLY IN SYNC.

Realizing this provides us with the answer to gaylib’s success:
how naive can gays be, to think politicians are interested in
sexual preference!

They are of course interested in USING this issue for furthering
their priorities.

Their priorities are clear and have been formulated:
a New World Order.

 

Like communism, a NWO requires the elimination of organic and historical
communities and tradition, religious sentiment, patriotism, ‘blood 
and soil’ mentalities, the destruction of social cohesion and sense of 
 identity, and the abolishing altogether of any type of absolute reference.

A new order requires the abolition of the old order.

Gaylib has been an effective ploy for furthering these goals, in fact 
significantly spearheading them in society.

How convenient that science AND gay activists constantly bash religion! 
That politicians AND gay activists bash Islam. That the porn industry AND 
gay activists promote sexual consumerism.

That Big Pharma AND gay activists push poison pills. That jewish media AND 
gays constantly warn us about fascism and the suffering of minorities. This 
list goes on and on…
*

 

Many gays, especially the more programmed younger generations fail to
appreciate how their plight FULLY CONVERGES with the goals of corporate, 
political and elite controllers; the gays have got it all UPSIDE-DOWN.

They believe they pressured elites into backing their plight, not realizing 
that they are in reality being used for someone else’s purposes.

Gays today  are positioned in their US-versus-THEM mindframe, figuring that 
as long as ‘hate’ and ‘homophobia’ are being attacked, as long as religion 
is being ridiculed and as long  as pro-gay legislation is being passed, 
things are looking up.

This is being VERY shortsighted. This oppositionality to ‘evil others’ is 
in reality ALL THAT GAYS HAVE LEFT. Nothing else remains.

 

The substance of gay life has been replaced by the concepts of a new and
bizarre ‘gay’ (ungay?) ideology that is as simplistic, shallow and 
immature as it is effective in mobilizing unhappy people stripped of 
knowledge, life experience and understanding;

its essence is victimology, and its glorified aim of attaining full legal 
equality in terms of civil rights is defended with a vengeance by many 
gay men, especially the younger ones, for all the wrong reasons.

Identifying and locating an oppressor, an ‘evil other’, is the only way of 
shifting responsibility to an outer source for one’s failure to find 
personal happiness and experience psychological growth.

 

The system has in fact been chain-producing oppression-narratives since 
centuries, creating US-versus-THEM categories that always impute the source 
of all problems of one social group to the evil of another.

With Marx, an entire ideological system was edified upon this scape-goating
mechanism, purporting to provide a fullblown science about the nature of
society and how it evolves through clashes between opposing groups.

Minority struggles and civil rights movements such as black lib and gaylib
are solidly anchored in Marxist ideology, and it is no secret that
pretty much all the early post WWII activists were communists, setting
up the civil rights movements.

In order to sell this oppression-narrative to the ‘minority group’, it
doesn’t suffice to just make the constat that one group oppresses
another.

For the narrative to have a potential for mobilization, it must come with
a goal of change, since otherwise the constat would merely be depressing
and stripped of constructive implications.

 

Thus what is required is a PROGRAM, and this program must promise an
endgoal, if the minority, or the oppressed group is to buy into it.

This is why the proletariat was promised a ‘Utopia’, why Martin Luther
King spoke of the ‘Promised Land’, and gaylib promises ‘Equality’.

 

Observe how VAGUE these promises are, how they are never developed into
a fullblown vision of the future state of society;
what is being promised is a CONCEPT, completely stripped of SUBSTANCE.

 

The problem that now rises is that the minority, or those who feel 
oppressed, and who may very well have been oppressed IN ACTUALITY,  are so 
eager to find a culprit responsible for their suffering, so angry and 
driven by all sorts of hang ups and pent up emotions, that they are not in 
a position to engage in rational thought and analyze their circumstances 
and the situation lucidly.

While the state of oppression they are experiencing may indeed be a result 
of
ACTUAL oppression, their eagerness to identify an oppressor will make
them settle for ANY culprit the media provides them with.

 

And so the workers are told the capitalists are responsible for all the ills
in the world, women are told men are, blacks are told white people are 
responsible for their suffering, the Western world is told Islam’s
highest goal is to do away with Freedom and Democracy, and gays are told 
religious bigots and pretty much all straight men are responsible for
their misery.

 

But WHAT IF the REAL source of oppression is more diffuse than that?

What if pretty much ALL of society’s members, straights and gays alike, 
males and females, blacks and whites, EVERYBODY is experiencing some form 
of  oppression?

 

*

And thus it seems the gay dream today is to be ‘equal’ to straights, and no 
longer be  ‘oppressed’…

One instantly senses that this notion of ‘equality’ must have a very 
precise meaning, even though it is seldom explicitated what that would be, 
what precisely such equality entails.

What does gay life look like when gays are fully equal to straights? What 
does this notion of  ‘equality’ really entail? What virus is lurking in 
this concept?

Indeed, how could a woman be ‘equal’ to a man, or a black to a white or a 
gay to a straight? Why would these very nomers, these categories, even 
exist if these people were indeed equal and the same.

Why even call a woman a woman, and not a man, if a man and a woman are 
equal and the same? Why not simply  call a black man ‘white’, if he is 
equal and the same to white men?

 

The notion of ‘equality’ of course refers to EXACT equal treatment of
all people under the law.

But if this is REALLY the objective, then the fastest way to get there
would be to make no legal provisions at all that specifically target
‘minorities’ or their treatment.

In real life, does this  ‘equality’ for women, blacks or gays bring an end 
to oppression?
Well, only in a very specific situation:

only if the group one is becoming ‘equal’ with is NOT oppressed itself.

Is this the case? Are white males in society NOT oppressed?

 

What if a straight human resource in a production process is really in a 
state of oppression too?
What if not only the entire Third World has been oppressed and ravaged since
centuries, but ALL HUMAN RESOURCES are?

What if millions of people are oppressed by psychiatry and hundreds of
millions poisoned by the medical system?

What if everybody is owned by bankers?

What if the ENTIRE SYSTEM is fundamentally oppressive?

What if ALL of society’s members are oppressed by a few?

What if it is being a bit too simple-minded to simply identify another
group as the source of all ills?
And what if it is in fact the WRONG group that is identified as the 
ultimate cause of all problems?

 

*

 

The masses are unaware of how society is being managed like a cattle-farm,
and what kind of principles are being applied.

With regards to gay activism, it seems that with each legal victory that is 
secured, the gay man is stripped of yet another piece of the substance of 
the gay life he once had,  becoming yet angrier and even more embittered, 
realizing little that as  society is changing, his very life and identity 
are being changed with it, in ways he doesn’t understand.

This process has spiralled so far out of control, that it is fair to  say 
that today, any straight guy who seems equipped with a fair dose of 
 masculinity and virility, and who posseses a significant amount of traits 
historically associated with ‘real men’, is no longer the subject of a gay 
man’s dreams and fantasies:
such men are now fast becoming ‘the enemy’.

Maybe it is time to start wondering just what exactly went wrong, if the 
defining feature of today’s vocal and out gay man is actually his HATRED of 
‘real men’, rather than his inherent attraction for such males.

Such an alarming and bizarre conundrum would imply a tragic, fundamental 
impossibility at the very heart of modern male/male sexual love under the
current, promoted paradigm.

 

This scenario isn’t at all as farfetched as it might seem:
most homosexuals today are experiencing very significant difficulty finding 
warmth and love.

As the gayscene disappears, many homosexual simply don’t have a gay 
lifestyle to engage in anymore, and the nomer ‘gay’actually starts to feel 
inadequate; indeed, without even a gay lifestyle, what is a gay but a 
homosexual man?

Without any kind of gay infrastructure or gay social context,
the gay identity is stripped of its substance, and becomes no more
than a difference in sexual preference that best remains hidden.

Under these circumstances, many homosexuals will end up having to settle 
for quick, discreet, and often guilty encounters with other males in 
parks, parking spaces and highway rest areas, where people have learned 
to cruise from the safety of their cars.

It is obvious that there is no place for another male in the lives of such 
fast-growing numbers of ‘closet homosexuals’. 

 

Maybe you don’t notice it yet in the Marais in Paris, or in Castro district 
in San Francisco, but in any small town or midlle-sized city in the Western 
world, homosexual men do NOT advertise their sexual preference at all.

Wearing sunglasses and sitting in parked cars reading a newspaper or 
pretending to be engaged in phone conversations, these guys certainly don’t
make boyfriend material.

They won’t meet a fullblown man, but just his c**k, just like back in
the 50s. They won’t marry the guy they meet, won’t live together, and are 
very likely to never meet again, with the guy they spend 15 minutes with.

The experience is quick and degrading, leaving an after-taste of vice,
guilt and loneliness.
The homosexual act is fully walled off from the rest of that guy’s life.

 

This is the position countless homosexuals and bi’s are in today, unless 
they live in big cities and recreational areas with a remaining, significant
gay infrastructure.

 

*

 

As we’ve seen, gay-themed movies also seem to reflect a fundamental problem 
with the modern gay model and gay identity.

Watch ANY of the many dozens of vapid gay movies that have been put out
in the last decade or so, and observe the main characters…

There is hardly any polarity between them. NOT ONE of those movies
features the kind of electric dynamic Hollywood could create so well
between famous screen couples.

 

In gay movies, you won’t find a rough guy sticking it to a soft guy,
because that would be ‘stereotyping’.

In fact, many lead actors in modern gay-themed movies are actually 
straight. They are clean, reasonably goodlooking, young, and so is the guy 
they fall in love with.

All the time the subtext appears to be: ‘See? gay men are just like
anybody else’, while simultaneously the exact contrary is evidenced
by the very fact that this point is being made with such insistence.

The lead actors are so similar to one another that sexual chemistry is 
lacking altogether.

The absence of convincing sexual chemistry in gay movies speaks volumes
about the state of gay love in the world;

indeed, if the story lines are this trite and predictable, if the 
characters hardly have any depth at all, if there is not a single memorable 
scene between two lead actors in gay roles, then could it be that there is 
something fundamentally dysfunctional  altogether about the gay paradigm 
politicians, the media and Hollywood are trying to sell us?

Could it be that male/male relations are in fact NOT identical and the
same and perfectly equal to male/female relations?

If they can’t even show us a workable, credible and interesting gay 
relation in a MOVIE, then what does this tell us about its feasibility and 
its prevalence in real life?

Why would they even make movies exclusively revolving around a gay
relation unless a model for it needs to be provided?

 *

Gays didn’t challenge heterosexual power. ‘Government’ created a theatrical 
confrontation between paid, owned gay actors and society at large, changing 
society in the process, in a way  that benefits neither straights nor gays, 
but only those who pull ALL of society’s strings, and who shape culture.

What can the scope of gay love be, when society’s gays have been turned 
into programmed drones?﻿

comments.text:
A personal story is an appeal to emotion.  The real questions are WHAT IS 
MARRIAGE and WHY IS IT IMPORTANT, WHAT ARE IT'S CONTRIBUTIONS TO SOCIETY? 
 She failed to address ANY of those (as nearly everyone does)!  Gay 
marriage is a misnomer.  One must simply assume the fundamental 
REdefinition of the institutions of marriage AND family FIRST.  This is not 
about personal FEELINGS and EMOTIONS.  And FYI, I don't need your approval 
or a piece of paper to be UNITED to a member of the OPPOSITE sex.  SAME SEX 
persons (who are notoriously promiscuous—and yes the rest of the nation is 
catching up with them) cannot be united and thus, in principle, cannot ever 
be united or contribute to natural marriage or generate a family—ever.  It 
is simply impossible!  Who cares if she was speaking from the heart? 
 Pedophiles, polygamists (bisexuals?), and the loving folks from PETA can 
make the same kind of plea!  (Jeffery Dahmer's was not so emotional, but it 
was completely rational!)  Look, social institutions are NOT created to 
affirm the emotions of individuals, they are there for the benefit of the 
whole, they should serve to encourage what is natural (biologically 
speaking), encourage what is only the natural, necessary, and HEALTHY NORMS 
(NOT biological deviancy), and for the protection of the next generation.

WHY are our leaders making such silly emotional appeals and not using 
reason and logic, or even appealing to science (anatomy and biology)?

Also, Walsh appeals to rights (unalienable?) and what is actually right 
(universal moral absolutes?)—yet she provides no rational basis for 
discovering this whatsoever—she simply assumes that what she asserts IS 
what is right!  (Clearly, biological function and design is not an accepted 
means of assisting in determining such things.)  From where does the idea 
of universal human rights and dignity come?  Who made that rule?  (NOT from 
science and NOT from evolution theory!) Why do we believe that human life 
is worthy of dignity and respect (not to be confused with human behavior)? 
 And if our rights are so important, what about homosexual adoptions?  That 
is a preemptive guarantee that the natural born right of the child to a 
mother and father is intentionally denied (violated—infringed upon), is 
something that does NOT comport with the social sciences, while granting a

comments.text:
Like I said...I don't think she was presenting an argument...she was 
sharing a personal connection/experience to give a face to tolerance and 
acceptance. Marriage allows gay people to protect the lives they build 
together. It allows them to inherit their partner's share of the estate 
without being taxed to death (civil unions don't provide that). They can 
get onto each other's health insurance and file taxes together (which is a 
huge savings, in many cases). Civil unions don't allow for partners to file 
taxes together. Marriage allows homosexuals the right to make decisions for 
their partner when that person can no longer make decisions for them self, 
because of failed health or being injured in an accident. It allows them to 
be with their partner (in a hospital setting) without being asked to leave 
or having to fight about it with their partner's homophobic family. The 
argument is this...if GAY people are made to pay the same taxes and follow 
the same laws as everyone else--then they should be given the same rights. 
The argument that won this debate and will make gay marriage legal in all 
50 states very soon...is that it's unconstitutional to discriminate against 
a person based on their gender or sexual orientation. Marriage is not a 
religious union (unless you make it one) it's a civil union. You don't get 
divorced in a church, you divorce in court...so the argument that it's for 
religious reasons or procreation (only) is ridiculous. Neither of those 
situations are the case in MANY heterosexual marriages. People 
evolve...it's the way of the world. Just like slavery had to go...so did 
discriminating against homosexuals. I think it makes the world a much 
better place. Celebrating and supporting LOVE is much better than dwelling 
on who to hate, discriminate against, or treat badly just because we don't 
personally agree with them (based on religious beliefs, morals, etc.). Love 
frees us. It makes us better. I for one, am ready to celebrate the good in 
others and leave the nastiness behind. Life is too short to be a hateful 
bigot with prehistoric ideas. The main argument here...We have learned too 
much to be ignorant any longer. We have evolved. We are different. You will 
probably say that's not a good thing...I disagree. When we allow others to 
flourish, we flourish with them. Holding people down is wrong. Besides...if 
you don't agree with gay marriage you always have the right not to be in 
one. Right? No one is holding a gun to your head. You still can make your 
own decisions.

Hailey’s Comet was first predicted by English astronomer Edmond Halley by 
applying Isaac Newton’s Theories of Planetary motion. He predicted it would 
come on 25 December 1758, and even pinpointed exactly the time of day and 
location in the sky that it would be seen. Unfortunately he died in 1742 so 
he never learned that he was correct. Dmitri Mendeleev, a Russian chemist 
from the late nineteenth century, predicted the modern-day periodic table

about 60 or so elements. We've since discovered more than 40 more. By 
organizing elements' atomic weight and various properties, Mendeleev 
started to see patterns. He noted the gaps in the table and predicted 
elements that would likely fill them. The planet Neptune was mathematically 
predicted by studying fluctuations in Uranus’ orbit before it was directly 
observed. With a prediction by Urbain Le Verrier, telescopic observations

attraction to corpses... now while I'm very open minded, I don't see a way 
for a dead body to consent to sex.

Incest is sex between close relatives. Again, its not the same as 
homosexuality, though there could possibly be incest between to gay people. 
honestly I really don't care, but As long as they are not parent and child. 
Due to possible brain washing and problems within genetics if they had kids.

Zoophilia is a paraphilia involving cross-species sexual activity between 
human and non-human animals or a fixation on such practice. Although sex 
with animals is not outlawed in some countries, in most countries, 
bestiality is illegal under animal abuse laws or laws dealing with crimes 
against nature. I see no way for a animal to consent.

As for Pedophilia, it is a psychiatric disorder in which an adult or older 
adolescent experiences a primary or exclusive sexual attraction to 
prepubescent children, generally age 11 years or younger. As a medical 
diagnosis, specific criteria for the disorder extends the cut-off point for 
prepubescence to age 13. A person who is diagnosed with pedophilia must be 
at least 16 years of age, but adolescents who are 16 years of age or older 
must be at least five years older than the prepubescent child before the 
attraction can be diagnosed as pedophilia.
